active_incidents.title: Degraded performance with the Giphy integration

notes.body: It appears that Giphy is seeing signs of improved performance. We'll continue to monitor the situation and let you know when a full resolution has been reached.

Weâ€™re aware of a current problem with the Giphy app and some users might be seeing error messages, or that results aren't matching. We're monitoring the situation and we appreciate your patience and understanding in the meantime. We'll provide an update when we know more.
